post.body: Sweet. Philip K. Dick is one of my favorite writers, in any genre.
Heh, some other WSN person started randomly following me on Twitter, and I saw she was following you too. Welcome to Web 2.0!
Awesome. What classic science fiction? I hope Dune's on that list, if you haven't already read it.
When the word "progressive" inevitably gets demonized too, I wonder what we'll replace it with. "Cuddly," maybe?
